doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 56 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 167[Air Date: 10/22/1985] [3]--Bathhouse
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 56 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 167[Air Date: 10/22/1985] [3]--Bathhouse

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. New York State denies pentagon, refuses to screen new recruits for HTLVIII2.Washington gay bathhouses debate3.Temple University renews recruiting policy on campus4. Gay civil rights victory, University of Maryland5. Annual Human Rights Campaign Fund dinner Coverage, includes Phil DonahueCOMMERCIAL: Orientation '85, funded by The National Gay Task Force6. Bathhouse debate7. World Health Organization announces an international AIDS research program8. National Institute of Health shows AIDS and "poppers" link9. AIDS witch-hunt in Houston, Texas10. Georgetown Island, Maine hotel refuses to house lesbian coupleCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp11. Sports12. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Dennis Aldman, Policy Fellow at the Institute for Health Policy Studies at The University of California at San Francisco, discusses political aspects of AIDS13. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: AIDS hotline, New York AIDS Action2. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: Orientation '85, funded by The National Gay Task Force3. Broadway Confidential, includes clip of Steven Spielberg's "Amazing Stories"4. Current events/media/culture, includes clip of Dire Straits music video, "Money for Nothing" and CNN AIDS report5. Closing credits
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 56 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 167[Air Date: 10/22/1985] [3]--Bathhouse: October 1985
